title: Cheers William, It's Christmas
description: A heartwarming short story of a widow's first Christmas at home without her beloved husband.Kathleen is a mother and grandmother who loves Christmas. After losing her husband, Kathleen is anxious about spending her first festive season without him. Thankfully she has her son and two daughters to help her through it. Or does she?How will she cope without William and will this remain her favourite time of year?
author: Toni Carter
